    Combine summary files from multiple directories

    combine_summary_files.Rd

    This function applies the combine_summaries function to each directory path provided in results_file_paths.

    Usage

    combine_summary_files(
  results_file_paths,
  pattern = "_summary.csv",
  output_prefix = NULL,
  parallel = FALSE,
  cores = NULL
)

    Arguments

    results_file_paths

    A character vector of directory paths to search for summary files.

    pattern

    A character string specifying the pattern to match for summary files. Default is '_summary.csv'.

    output_prefix

    A character string specifying the prefix to be added to the output file name. Default is NULL (no prefix).

    parallel

    A logical value indicating whether to use parallel processing. Default is FALSE.

    cores

    An integer specifying the number of cores to use for parallel processing. Default is NULL (automatically determined).

    Examples

    if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
results_dirs <- c("path/to/results1", "path/to/results2")
combine_summary_files(results_dirs, pattern = "_summary.csv", output_prefix = "experiment_1", parallel = TRUE, cores = 4)
} # }
